summary: This is a brief email from August 15, 2019, regarding efforts to expedite subpoena returns from phone companies in relation to the Epstein case. The sender informs their team that they have enlisted the help of an individual (whose name is redacted) for this task.

events.title: Request to expedite phone company subpoenas
events.description: The sender of the email reports that they have asked an individual to help expedite the return of subpoenas from phone companies.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 15, 2019, concerning the Epstein investigation.
The email discusses efforts to expedite the return of subpoenas from phone companies.
An individual referred to as 'S' is tasked with assisting in this expedited process.
